subject: Boost Sales in Q4 - SEM Campaign for SIMSONN
description_text:
Dear Team,

Hope all is well!

I’m reaching out on behalf of shoppingspout.us with Goaffpro Network ID:
[11712734], an affiliate partner of *SIMSONN*. We truly value our ongoing
partnership and are eager to take it to the next level this *Q4 *— the most
exciting and high-conversion shopping season of the year.

As we move into this crucial sales period, we’d like your approval to
launch targeted SEM/PPC campaigns on Google and Bing, targeted on
high-intent TM+ keywords such as:


   - *SIMSONN discount code*
   - *SIMSONN coupon code*
   - *SIMSONN promo code*
   - *SIMSONN coupon*


To protect brand integrity, your standalone brand name, *"SIMSONN," *will
be set as a *negative *keyword—ensuring there is no direct brand bidding.

Also you don't have to pay us any amount for the ads, as all expenses are
on us. your standard Goaffpro commission remains unchanged.

For more details, please review our media kit:

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZE_LS3omWpTnSYyvH5xfM7ZDjDN4A7I1/view

We believe this initiative will enhance visibility and generate sales from
the *US *and *Canadian* markets.

Looking forward to your positive approval!

Best regards,
Hifza Khalid
Communication Manager
shoppingspout.us

conversations.body_text: Hi Hifza,  Thank you for reaching out, and we appreciate your continued partnership with us.  We’re happy to approve your request to run SEM/PPC campaigns targeting SIMSONN coupon-related keywords, with the brand name “SIMSONN” set as a negative keyword as outlined. Thank you for taking care to protect our brand integrity in your campaigns.  To support your initiative, we can create a custom 8% discount code for your PPC traffic. Please let us know the preferred code name, and we will activate it for your GoAffPro account.  Looking forward to increased visibility and sales in the US and Canadian markets this season.  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Hi Team,

Thank you so much for the SEM rights. Please set the code name as *SIMSSP8*
.

Best regards,
Hifza

On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 10:56 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Hifza Khalid,    Alright, it's been set up for you. The minimum threshold is $179.

Hi,

Awesome, thank you so much!

Best,
Hifza

On Fri, Dec 12, 2025 at 1:19 PM service@simsonn.com
